feed.title: OmniTools Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OmniTools: v0.1.0
entry.content:
Docker images

  • iib0011/omni-tools:latest
  • iib0011/omni-tools:0.1.0

What's new

PNG Tools:

  • Compress PNG: Reduce the file size of PNG images without losing quality.
  • Convert JPG to PNG: Easily convert JPG images to PNG format.
  • Create Transparent PNG: Make parts of an image transparent.
  • Change Colors in PNG: Replace specific colors in a PNG image.

Text Tools:

  • Text Splitter: Split text into multiple lines or segments.
  • Text Joiner: Combine multiple lines of text into one.
  • String to Morse: Convert text into Morse code.

JSON Tools:

  • Prettify JSON: Format JSON data for better readability.

List Tools:

  • Sort: Arrange list items in ascending or descending order.
  • Unwrap: Remove wrapping characters (like quotes) from list items.
  • Reverse: Reverse the order of items in a list.
  • Find Unique: Identify and keep only unique items from a list.
  • Find Most Popular: Find the most frequently occurring items.
  • Group: Group list items based on a common attribute.
  • Rotate: Shift list items by a certain number of positions.
  • Shuffle: Randomly rearrange list items.

GIF Tools:

  • Change Speed: Adjust the playback speed of GIFs.

Number Tools:

  • Sum Calculator: Calculate the sum of a list of numbers.
  • Generate Numbers: Create a sequence of numbers.

New Contributors

  • @Made4Uo made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/8
  • @Chesterkxng made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/15
  • @hhourani27 made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/17

Full Changelog: https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/commits/v0.1.0

entry.title: New release for OmniTools: v0.2.0
entry.content:
Docker images

  • iib0011/omni-tools:latest
  • iib0011/omni-tools:0.2.0

What's New ?

🖼️ PNG Tools

  • Change PNG Opacity
  • Crop
  • Remove Background from PNG with AI

📄 PDF Tools

  • Split PDF
  • Rotate PDF

✍️ Text Tools

  • Remove duplicate lines
  • Text Replacer
  • Repeat text
  • Truncate text
  • Reverse
  • Randomize case
  • Uppercase
  • Extract substring
  • Create palindrome
  • Palindrome
  • Quote
  • Rotate
  • Rot13

🎥 Video Tools

  • Trim Video

📂 JSON Tools

  • Validate JSON
  • Minify JSON
  • Stringify JSON
  • Convert JSON to XML

📋 List Tools

  • Wrap
  • Truncate
  • Duplicate

📊 CSV Tools

  • Convert CSV to JSON
  • Convert CSV to XML

🔢 Number Tools

  • Generate Arithmetic Sequence

⏳ Time Tools

  • Convert Days to Hours
  • Convert Hours to Days
  • Convert Seconds to Time
  • Convert Time to Seconds
  • Calculate days between dates
  • Truncate Clock Time

New Contributors

  • @EugSh1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/33
  • @TheLukasHenry made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/41
  • @ady-cf made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/44
  • @EpicureanHeron made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/52
  • @ARRY7686 made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/53
  • @lfsjesus made their first contribution in https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/pull/58

Full Changelog: https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

entry.title: New release for OmniTools: v0.3.0
entry.content:
Docker images

  • iib0011/omni-tools:latest
  • iib0011/omni-tools:0.3.0

What's New ?

UI improvements

  • Dark theme
  • Button to go back from tool categories
  • Improve responsiveness

Image Tools (Moved from PNG tools - made it general)

  • Resize Image
  • Compress Image
  • Remove Background from Image
  • Crop Image
  • Change Image Opacity
  • Change Colors in Image
  • Create Transparent PNG
  • Image to Text (OCR)

PDF Tools

  • Compress PDF
  • Protect PDF

CSV Tools

  • Convert CSV Rows to Columns
  • Convert CSV to TSV
  • Swap CSV Columns
  • CSV to YAML
  • Change CSV Separator
  • Find Incomplete CSV Records

Video Tools

  • Rotate Video
  • Compress Video
  • Loop Video

Number & Calculation Tools

  • Ohm's Law Calculator
  • Round Trip Voltage Drop in Cable
  • Area of a Sphere
  • Volume of a Sphere

Other Utilities

  • Escape JSON

entry.title: New release for OmniTools: v0.5.0
entry.content:
Docker Images

  • iib0011/omni-tools:latest
  • iib0011/omni-tools:0.5.0

What's New?

🖼️ Image Tools

  • Image Editor (crop, rotate, add filters, watermark, annotate and more)
  • Rotate Image
  • Convert Images to JPG

📄 PDF Tools

  • PDF Editor (add text, images, signature, checkboxes)
  • PDF to PNG

🎥 Video Tools

  • Video to GIF

🔊 Audio Tools

  • Extract Audio
  • Change Speed
  • Trim Audio
  • Merge Audio

⏱️ Time Tools

  • Crontab Explainer
  • Check Leap Years

🔠 String & Text Tools

  • Text Censor

🧾 XML Tools

  • XML Beautifier
  • XML Validator
